text: Nov 12 Chinese e-commerce platform Pinduoduo Inc reported better-than-expected quarterly revenue on Thursday, helped by strong demand as the domestic economy began to show signs of a recovery from the COVID-19 pandemic.Revenue jumped 89% to 14.21 billion yuan ($2.15 billion) in the third quarter ended Sept. 30, beating analysts estimates of 12.34 billion yuan ($1.86 billion), according to IBES data from Refinitiv.
